sentence.Network_en: He sat on the terrace of his sun-drenched villa in the South of France.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坐在自己位于法国南部的阳光别墅的露天平台上。

sentence.Network_en: Sipping cocktails on a sun - drenched beach.
sentence.Network_cn: 在阳光普照的海滩上享用鸡尾酒.

sentence.Network_en: Sun drenched colours a faded Grecian fresco.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳浸染的色彩宛如沧桑的古希腊壁画.

PerfectNetExp.abs: some scientists and industry developers claim that Nevada's empty and sun-drenched expanses alone could supply enough terawatts to power the entire country .一些科学家和行业研发人员声称，内华达拥有阳光普照下的大片空旷领土，足以满足整个国家的电力需求。

scientists in sun-drenched Australia are improving the efficiency of solar cells , offering hope that solar power will be cheaper than coal-fired electricity within a few years .在阳光充沛的澳大利亚，科学家正致力于提高太阳能电池的效率，并表示希望几年内太阳能发电能比燃煤发电便宜。
